questions: what types of promotions can i run on GiveaVoucher
how do i create a giveavoucher promotion type
what are the options for voucher promotions
answers: Here are the promotion types you can run on GiveaVoucher:
â€¢ Get Extra Value â€“ A customer buys a voucher (e.g. Â£50) and the recipient receives extra value (e.g. Â£60).
â€¢ Get Percentage Added On â€“ Purchase a voucher (e.g. Â£50) and receive a percentage bonus (e.g. 10% â†’ voucher worth Â£55).
â€¢ Get Amount Off â€“ The customer pays less for a voucher (e.g. buy Â£50 voucher for Â£40).
â€¢ Get Percentage Off â€“ A percentage discount on voucher purchase (e.g. buy Â£100 voucher for Â£80 â€“ 20% off).
â€¢ Recipient Gets Additional Voucher â€“ When a voucher is purchased (e.g. Â£50), the recipient also receives a bonus voucher (e.g. Â£10) for future use.
â€¢ Sender Gets Additional Voucher â€“ When you buy a voucher for someone else (e.g. Â£50), you (the sender) receive a bonus voucher (e.g. Â£10) for yourself.

You can customise each promotion further by applying specific conditions such as:
â€¢ Voucher Template â€“ limit to specific voucher types.
â€¢ Category â€“ apply only to certain voucher categories.
â€¢ Spend Threshold â€“ set a minimum purchase amount to unlock the promotion.
â€¢ Time Profile â€“ define start & end dates (ideal for holidays or sales events).
â€¢ Customer Group â€“ target specific segments (e.g. VIPs or members).
